"About the "Login Mark".":
"All ARKS members are given a Login Mark to show which gaming platform they are currently logged into.

Certain Quests will also require a particular Login Mark, like "PC" or "PS Vita".

You can check out which Login Mark you currently have by going to the Main Menu, selecting Character Info, and then choosing Event Items."
